sentences.en: And yet they deem themselves the hosts and us the guests.
sentences.cn: 但他们却认为他们是主人,我们是客人.

sentences.en: Do not set your goals by what other people deem important.
sentences.cn: 请不要把他人认为重要的事情作为你的目标.

sentences.en: Don't set your goals by what other people deem important.
sentences.cn: 别人认为重要的事不一定是你的目标.

sentences.en: Don't you deem that it is your duty to help?
sentences.cn: 你不认为助人是你的责任 吗 ?

sentences.en: French and German were deemed essential.
sentences.cn: 法语和德语被认为是必需的。

sentences.en: I deem dolphin as the most interesting animal in the zoo.
sentences.cn: 我想动物园里最有趣的动物是海豚.

sentences.en: I deem it advisable to purchase the shares in the railway now.
sentences.cn: 我认为现在购买铁路股票是明智的.

sentences.en: I deem it an honour to accept your invitation.
sentences.cn: 承蒙您的邀请,我觉得很荣幸.

sentences.en: I deem it my duty to help the poor.
sentences.cn: 我认为帮助穷人是我的职责.

sentences.en: I deem it my duty to remind her of it.
sentences.cn: 我认为提醒她是我的责任.

sentences.en: It neither offends us, nor can we deem it hostile.
sentences.cn: 它既不触犯我们, 我们也不认为它怀有敌意.

sentences.en: People with strong negative mentality tend to deem himself as a victim.
sentences.cn: 有强烈逆反心理的人容易将自己视为受害者.

sentences.en: Then string your necklaces , bracelets, anklets or earrings as you deem beautiful.
sentences.cn: 然后按你心里认为美丽的式样串起项链、手链 、 脚链或耳环.

sentences.en: This is what we would deem to be good and excellent business.
sentences.cn: 这就是我们将认为是优良业务.

sentences.en: We deem it necessavy to make this clear to you.
sentences.cn: 这件事我们认为有必要跟你们说清楚.

sentences.en: We deem very highly of his administrative talent.
sentences.cn: 我们非常看重他的管理才能.

words.tran_cn: 认为，持某种看法；作某种评价

trans.tran_en: to think of something in a particular way or as having a particular quality
to think of something in a particular way or as having a particular quality
